description:
Professional Data Recovery Tool

Professional Data Recovery Tool. Free to recover 2 GB of data. Easily & quickly recover deleted photos, documents, videos, email, etc. Recover data from local drives, external drives, USB drives, SD cards, mobile phones, and other removable devices.
1. Fixed an issue that could leave an afterimage on the desktop when the window was minimized.
2. Fixed an issue where the program could close unexpectedly when restoring data.
3. Fixed some minor bugs in the previous version.
4. Improve the preview window to center the previewed image.
